messages.subject: making Yu-gi-oh cards
messages.msgSnippet: My boys are doing that as well.  They make something out of legos or just strike a pose and have me take a picture of it.  Then download it on the computer
messages.messageBody:
"My boys are doing that as well. They make something out of legos or just
strike a pose and have me take a picture of it. Then download it on the
computer
and they add the attack/defense etc to the bottom of the card and print it
out.

Too funny...my boys have been doing this also.
They figured out that in the KidPix program, they can create the entire card then print it out. Looks fairly convincing. They even got the size right.
They slip them into the protectors, so no laminating here. Very cool!

Ren
